lead_paragraph: The State Senate voted to increase the wage by 2021. If Gov. Chris Christie signs the bill, the state would join New York and California in raising hourly pay to $15.

headline.print_headline: New Jersey Senate Passes $15 Minimum Wage; Braces for Veto
headline.main: New Jersey Senate Passes $15 Minimum Wage, Setting Up Clash With Christie

snippet: The State Senate voted to increase the wage by 2021. If Gov. Chris Christie signs the bill, the state would join New York and California in raising hourly pay to $15.
abstract: New Jersey State Senate passes bill that will raise minimum wage to more than $15 by 2021, setting stage for showdown with Gov Chris Christie, who has said it could have devastating impact on economy; Democrats say they will seek public referendum on minimum wage hike in 2017 should Christie veto bill.
